name: Marooned In The Desert
description:
MAROONED IN THE DESERT

Marooned in the desert is a short endless game where the aim is to survive as long a possible. It is voxel and 3D. For more information go to http://highrisestudios.weebly.com/marooned-in-the-desert.html.

this is a zombie remix (also health) of TairaGames Cowboys vs Ninjas although all of the code and asstes used were self made by me and lowrise.
